incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 26/03/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 26/03/2022 02:00 UTC UTC Service impact : Interruption of network redundancy / Decrease in bandwith for servers with LACP activated during the intervention Service improvement: The objective is to resolve interface issue or any other bug and applying new software version/SMU
Start time : 28/03/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 28/03/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Upgrade TOR Switch to a new version

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.
Start time : 05/04/2022 13:30 UTC End time : 05/04/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Replacement of a faulty C13/C14 cable that powers the fans on the back of a rack.
Start time : 06/04/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 06/04/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to make a modification to a router configuration
Start time : 06/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 06/04/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Test in charge of low voltage generators on SBG3

Start time : 06/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 06/04/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to check UPS batteries and replace used or damaged ones

Start time : 06/03/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 06/03/2022 12:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to isolate the Low Voltage Switchboard 14 to allow work to be carried out around it.

Start time : 02/03/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 29/03/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to carry out verification work for the proper functioning of the servers.

All servers will be suspended tomorrow Tuesday, March 22, 2022.
Access to them will be unavailable
Update :All servers are now in rescue-pro or WinPE mode. All your data are now accessible
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Service impact : As we announced, we are closing SBG4 datacenter. We will reboot all the servers (located in SBG4 ==> racks 90Axx, 90Bxx, 90Cxx and 90Dxx) in rescue-pro or WinPE mode depending on your OS. A communication has been sent to you if your services are impacted. We thank you for your understanding
